title: Ticket #3866: Create a command to hold an entire workflow
description:
This is based on a question today from a user on htcondor-users. I think it would be useful to have a command (condor_hold_dag?) that would hold a DAGMan job and all of its node jobs; and do the same thing for any number of levels of sub-DAGs.

It's pretty simple to run a command to hold all of node jobs for a single-level DAG, but if you have sub-DAGs it gets trickier -- it would probably be useful to encapsulate this into a single command.
creator: wenger
